title: Evi's Blind Date
description: Evi has adamantly sworn off dating. Being a bridesmaid at seven weddings, catching the bouquet at four wedding, with no prospects in sight has caused Evi lonely nights and lonelier weekends. A heavy dater in her teens and twenties, now in her thirties and one bad date too many, she has given up finding her soul mate.Just when Evi is ready to bag it, trying to find Mr. Right, her friend convinces her to go on one more blind date. You'll want to see what happens on Evi's Blind Date.Bestselling author James Halon creates a satirical look at dating in this witty story, Evi's Blind Date.
author: James Halon
